heisigStory: The only thing that distinguishes this from the claw is the addition of the elbow, made by doubling up the third stroke and adding a fourth.
koohiiStory1: 何これ???? ok, sorry to be crude... if you claw at a girls melons, she is gonna give you the elbow.
koohiiStory2: Vegetarian vultures are fighting for a melon, each trying to elbow its way to it with claws.
